name: The Bay Set
garmentTypeLock: MATCHING COORDINATED SET â€” both top AND bottom pieces shown together as a complete outfit. Reproduce EXACTLY the top and bottom pieces shown in the reference images â€” same colors, same graphics, same fabric. NOT separate individual pieces.

brandingTech.logo: inside back neck: Stylized 'PR' monogram logo (likely brand's primary logo); center chest: Elaborate graphic depicting a thorny rose with blue/teal petals, emerging from a cracked, skull-like base with roots extending into a dark cloud or water pool.; entire shorts surface: Full-bleed graphic of a cityscape featuring a large bridge over water (e.g., Brooklyn Bridge/NYC skyline) with a blue sky and greenish-blue water.; lower right thigh (on shorts), integrated into background graphic: Small version of the thorny blue/teal rose graphic, consistent with the t-shirt's main graphic.

logos.description: Detailed graphic of a blue rose with metallic-effect thorns, growing from a cracked base/cloud. The graphic has a distinct raised texture.
logos.color: multiple shades of blue, grey, silver, black

logos.description: Cityscape graphic featuring a bridge, buildings, and water under a blue sky.
logos.color: various shades of blue, green, grey, black, white

logos.description: Smaller version of the blue rose logo with metallic-effect thorns and a base. Appears to have a slightly raised texture on top of the sublimated shorts fabric.
logos.color: multiple shades of blue, grey, silver, black

logoFingerprint.notes: The primary challenge was discerning between 'printed' and 'heat-transfer' for the textured rose graphics. Given the explicit definition of 'printed' as 'flat' and 'heat-transfer' allowing for 'different texture than fabric' and 'slight edge visible', the prominent raised texture on the rose graphics strongly points towards a sophisticated heat-transfer application rather than a flat print. The sublimated all-over print on the shorts is clearly distinct due to its dye-into-fabric nature with no surface texture.

modelPose: Full-length shot showing BOTH top and bottom of the matching set â€” complete coordinated outfit
setting: San Francisco waterfront at night, Bay Bridge illuminated in background, champagne gold light
